com.st.st25sdk.type5.lri

Class LRiTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
      • com.st.st25sdk.type5.Type5Tag
        • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STType5Tag
          • com.st.st25sdk.type5.lri.LRiTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface, CCFileInterface, Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface, NdefCommandInterface, SysFileInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LRi1KTag, LRi2KTag, LRi512Tag, LRiS2KTag

    public class LRiTag
extends STType5Tag
implements Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface
    Defines all required methods to handle LRi series

    • Method Detail

      • kill

        public byte kill(byte[] unencryptedKillCode)
          throws STException
        Description copied from interface: Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface
        This command is used to kill the tag (does not answer any RF commands) WARNING: This action is irreversible, it will not be possible to recover the tag
        Specified by:
        kill in interface Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface
        Parameters:
        unencryptedKillCode - data that will be compared with the tag's Kill password
        Returns:
        status byte answered by the tag
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeKill

        public byte writeKill(byte[] unencryptedKillPassword)
               throws STException
        Description copied from interface: Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface
        Command allowing to change the kill password WARNING: the Kill password should also be locked by calling lockKill()
        Specified by:
        writeKill in interface Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface
        Parameters:
        unencryptedKillPassword - Kill password that will be stored in the tag
        Returns:
        status byte answered by the tag
        Throws:
        STException
